descriptionHtml:
TacitRed Defender Threat Intelligence provides automated synchronization of threat intelligence from TacitRed to Microsoft Defender.

This solution includes:

  • Playbook: A Logic App that periodically syncs threat data from TacitRed to Defender.

Key Features:

  • Automated Threat Intel Sync
  • Integration with Azure Functions
